Considering our advancement we will be receiving more funding and are considering allocating it to a limilight. Before we dedicate a part of our budget to a Limelight I would like to know how to get Pathplanner to know you have mecanum drive and properly function with mecanum drive.(The docs for pathplanner mecanum drive confuse me) I would also like to know if I could program a coral autoalign function even though we have mecanum wheels. If anyone could tell me if this is possible and how to achieve this, it would be greatly
